mapper.select: select ai.*,a.Name AccountName,ioi.Name InOutItemName, dh.number billNumber from jsh_account_item ai left join jsh_account a on ai.account_id=a.id and ifnull(a.delete_Flag,'0') !='1' left join jsh_in_out_item ioi on ai.in_out_item_id = ioi.id and ifnull(ioi.delete_Flag,'0') !='1' left join jsh_depot_head dh on ai.bill_id = dh.id and ifnull(dh.delete_Flag,'0') !='1' where ai.header_id = #{headerId} and ifnull(ai.delete_flag,'0') !='1' order by ai.id asc
